name: Companies Interview Prep
description: A curated collection of company-specific interview preparation materials, including notes, practice problems, and strategies for data structures and algorithms.
roadmap: Add UI for filtering company topics
features: Browse company-specific interview topics and resources
Search and filter notes by company or topic
Responsive UI for desktop and mobile
key_learnings: Building a scalable React + NextJS project
State management and dynamic rendering in React
Designing user-friendly UI with MUI components
Handling client-side search, filtering, and routing
